        public void commitsAfterLastCheckPoint​(LogPosition logPosition,
                                       long firstTxIdAfterLastCheckPoint)
        Description copied from interface: RecoveryStartInformationProvider.Monitor
        There's a check point log entry, but there are other log entries after it.
        Specified by:
        commitsAfterLastCheckPoint in interface RecoveryStartInformationProvider.Monitor
        Parameters:
        logPosition - LogPosition pointing to the first log entry after the last check pointed transaction.
        firstTxIdAfterLastCheckPoint - transaction id of the first transaction after the last check point.
